analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0xa515f59ca4be22e9f082d7c56056037514f8481d.sol#130-145) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-testTokenA.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0xa515f59ca4be22e9f082d7c56056037514f8481d.sol#143-144)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0xa515f59ca4be22e9f082d7c56056037514f8481d.sol:
